name: GitHub Actions → GKE デプロイ 最小
description: GKEへkubectl applyする最小ワークフロー（認証はWorkload Identity/Service Account鍵のいずれか）。

files.template:
name: GKE Deploy

on: [workflow_dispatch]

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Auth GKE (placeholder)
        run: echo 'Authenticate with GKE: gcloud auth...'
      - name: Apply manifests
        run: kubectl apply -f k8s/
